section.title: A Not-So-Enchanting Night
section.p: Once in the beast's room, Belle discovers an enchanted rose that was placed under a curse by a mysterious woman. Just as she is about to touch it, the beast emerges and bellows at her to stay away out of rage. Frightened, she bolts from the castle.

image.alt: Beast scares Belle, showing him his scary teeth.
